allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Railway deployment support

Replace VM-based deployment with Railway PaaS:

- Add railway.toml configuration for Railway deployment
- Update Dockerfile to use dynamic PORT env var for Railway
- Add async_database_url and sync_database_url properties to handle
  Railway''s postgresql:// URL format \(vs postgresql+asyncpg://\)
- Rewrite CD workflow to use Railway CLI instead of SSH deployment
- Update database connection and migrations to use new URL properties

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add S3-compatible storage module for PDF caching

- Add storage client module with support for R2, S3, MinIO
- Add /health/storage and /health/all endpoints for monitoring
- Integrate storage with PaperFetcher for PDF caching
- Cache PDFs after fetching from external sources
- Check cache before fetching from Unpaywall/PMC/arXiv

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
